title: Google Chrome’s “Lite mode” will be killed next month
content:
“Lite mode,” one of the oldest features of Chrome, will soon be killed. Originally known as “Data Saver,” the feature has been part of Chrome for Android since 2014. But as mobile data has become cheaper and more easily accessible around the world, and together with Google’s AMP initiative, Lite mode is no longer as

The post Google Chrome’s “Lite mode” will be killed next month appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Lite mode will be removed with the upcoming milestone Chrome 100 release on the stable channel. Read on. to know more.
